Posts.EditableText: Do you know if french games exist for Quest ?
Posts.HTML: Do you know if french games exist for Quest ?

Posts.EditableText: I've worked a bit on a french translation of a game, but it's not much interesting. When the new version of TypeLib will be released, I may translate it to french so I could adapt into french a more interesting game (I hope) You can check my page at http://anamnese.online.fr/if/ and follow the link to the Quest page (http://anamnese.online.fr/if/quest.html if I'm not wrong)
